articles.description: The NBA announced the 14 reserve players for the All-Star Game rosters on Thursday night
articles.content: The 2025 NBA All-Star rosters have been set. After last week's announcement of the 10 starters, Thursday brought us the 14 final selections, who will be classified as reserves at All-Star Weekend in … [+3832 chars]

articles.author: Josh Alper
articles.title: Brandon Graham: Today was a good day, I don’t feel restricted at all - NBC Sports
articles.description: Defensive end Brandon Graham was back on the practice field for the Eagles on Thursday for the first time since he tore his triceps in Week 12.
articles.content:
Defensive end Brandon Graham was back on the practice field for the Eagles on Thursday for the first time since he tore his triceps in Week 12. 
Graham believed his season was over, but his recovery… [+779 chars]
